name: CGEventTapLocation
desc: Constants that specify possible tapping points for events.

items.name: case cghidEventTap
items.desc: Specifies that an event tap is placed at the point where HID system events enter the window server.

items.name: case cgSessionEventTap
items.desc: Specifies that an event tap is placed at the point where HID system and remote control events enter a login session.

items.name: case cgAnnotatedSessionEventTap
items.desc: Specifies that an event tap is placed at the point where session events have been annotated to flow to an application.
